content: it s pikachu in his pokeball pod home this is an amigurumi crochet pattern to help you create a functional pokeball that opens and closes it ll be the perfect home to house your pikachu or any other pokemon you happen to collect approximate size pokeball - 4 in/10cm wide by 4in/10cm tall pikachu - 4 in/10cm tall level easy skills needed single_crochet half_double_crochet crochet in the round slip_stitch
